title: Arrow of Artemis
description: Some people drink milk, some blood.Loren Bell—half-asleep on her feet but on a milk-buying mission for her sister—overcame an attack by a blood-drinking mythical creature.Mythical seemed like a relative concept. Apparently, a group of people have been studying them for years. This group treated her fatal injuries from the attack. However, they refused to explain anything else except that she might have a genetic mutation that is of interest to them. They also refused to let her go.She escapes. In her attempt, she encountered something terrifying that literally turned into a man in front ofher very own eyes. An irreverent, self-assured, and gorgeous hunk of a man called Niklaus Grimm.What was she to him when her touch soothes the Lycanthropy? Will he be her companion and guide or her pain and destruction in this new dimension of reality?
author: Ashley Michelle
